alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 06 at 8:03AM MDT until April 06 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blowing and drifting snow. Winds gusting 35 to 45 mph. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range, Natrona County Lower Elevations and Casper Mountain. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MDT this evening. Strongest winds will occur during the afternoon hours. * IMPACTS...Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Blowing and drifting snow will make it difficult to access livestock and keep roadways open.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
